game.name: Raisin Pudding: Sara’s Cooking Class
game.description:
In this popular and highly challenging game for girls, you will get a chance to prepare a new treat from Sara Cooking class. Raisin Pudding: Sara Cooking Class makes sure that the dish you will try here will be super sticky and sweet. Your goal in this exclusive free online cooking game is to learn how to prepare delicious raisin pudding by just following the Sara instructions with an open mind. No need to be worried in case if you commit mistakes while following her instructions since Sara is not going to scold you. 

Sara instructions are very simple and easy to follow when it comes to allowing you to create this wonderful dessert. Once you are done with playing this cool flash game in your browser, you can also try this scrumptious recipe on your own to for your family and friends and surprise their taste buds. They will surely give you a big thank you once you serve them this tasty dessert after lunch or dinner. You can also serve this dessert recipe on birthday occasion or Halloween party to your guests. 

This exciting flash game is equipped with classy graphics, easy control and awesome gameplay and ensures you to have huge fun while you learn. One of the best games to play for girls, Sara Cooking Class Raisin Pudding is a very important part of the worldwide recognized game series: Cooking. Have great fun girls! Please do not forget to share this latest cooking game with your friends!
